channel.title: Media on Synthesaurio
channel.description: Recent content in Media on Synthesaurio

item.title: Music
item.description: My music is very volatile to my mood and feelings, sometimes I make ambient, sometimes a mix of nu-cumbia/house. I am currently working in my next album that will be a compilation of nu-cumbia/house songs. Spotify Bandcamp The Green by Synthesaurio Other platforms Synthesaurio is also available on other platforms including Apple Music, Deezer, among others.

item.title: Video
item.description: See Synthesaurio Visuals Part of my artistic practice is experimenting with visuals using creative coding: Excerpt of a performance made for a virtual event. Performance at home
